Wellbeing Support & Resources for You


In challenging times, it’s important to come together and support one another. Our heartfelt sympathy goes out to those affected by the current situation in Lebanon and Palestine, and we hope for the violence and suffering to end.

Please know that support is always available to you, whether from your manager, people partner, HR Operations or a trusted colleague. There are also various Group Wellbeing Support and Resources, <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com%252ftrack%252fclick%253fu%253d101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a%2526id%253df7bbece0f7%2526e%253d320647af8f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTnDo22l7rZDqti%252fsWM0MvOMbeSwHwU0kLhsjoO8YOay%252fVz%252b1igWptvM8YwNq4kPK65fYKpea1WU1zJaMg42reQTZxBCNIhSPcAl5MIPTsbIogvE4rm2RWSITgL5OtvpudoFK197aeFM%252foQavoBkgwjY5yDWlfZAtLq7oZ9jNkdh4beF2SiiVroosa9aKUoWxVNK75GvLhXi4cwI6Id2U2vWsMglGYvPASBJbXWmAa7P&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce17ec07e0f114bd2b1ec08dcdd5a21e7%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638628626394846129%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N4pWDoI70SfXDmftuYE8Xeisgz6tQ41wOhkSb16i2Ug%3D&reserved=0>  including access to Employee Assistance Programs providing free and confidential counseling and therapy services, as well as online resources for mental health and emotional support.

3D&reserved=0>  including access to Employee Assistance Programs providing free and confidential counseling and therapy services, as well as online resources for mental health and emotional support.

Take advantage of these resources, connect with your support network - whether friends, family, or colleagues - and, most importantly, seek professional help when needed.

Explore all resources here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com%252ftrack%252fclick%253fu%253d101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a%2526id%253dc19873bda5%2526e%253d320647af8f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTnDo22l7rZDqti%252fsWM0MvOMbeSwHwU0kLhsjoO8YOay%252fVz%252b1igWptvM8YwNq4kPK65fYKpea1WU1zJaMg42reQTZxBCNIhSPcAl5MIPTsbIogvE4rm2RWSITgL5OtvpudoFK197aeFM%252foQavoBkgwjY5yDWlfZAtLq7oZ9jNkdh4beF2SiiVroosa9aKUoWxVNK75GvLhXi4cwI6Id2U2vWsMglGYvPASBJbXWmAa7P&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce17ec07e0f114bd2b1ec08dcdd5a21e7%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638628626394886142%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=6rDoOxPYlEDUqdLsR%2B6IjcuMZXgA2aQBloptnt97FY8%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/545220/82D9296CABBCBC08044416F275B483B0/nuggets-06.png> 	

MARNI OPENS ITS FIRST BOUTIQUE IN RIYADH

The wait is over, Marni is now available in the region! 

The Italian fashion brand known for its bold, distinctive experimental approach to materials and colours has opened its first standalone store in Kingdom Centre, Riyadh, KSA.

chunks.text:
The Italian fashion brand known for its bold, distinctive experimental approach to materials and colours has opened its first standalone store in Kingdom Centre, Riyadh, KSA.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/550412/A4CE3889475FB3629ECA668D76D7CC47/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-47.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

LAUNCH OF OUR CUSTOMER HAPPINESS CENTER

In partnership with the Dubai Department of Economy and Tourism’s Consumer Rights Department, the Group has launched the Customer Happiness Center at Level Shoes in the UAE. This initiative reinforces our commitment to delighting our customers, by addressing customer concerns quickly and ensuring a smooth shopping experience.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/550408/F7698DECCED155DEE03944C849912179/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-46.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/544764/921651EAC7806AA69AABF847A1D08697/nuggets-41.png> 	

SKINCARE RESET: POST VACATION GLOW

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/550410/9037A46009825771E395008263658E62/skincare-event.png> 	
Book your 1-1 consultations with our Skincare experts now, and give your skin the TLC it deserves!

Oct 1st, 2024 | 11.00AM - 5:00PM
Baniyas 1, 2 & 3 Meeting room D3

BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENT HERE <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fform.jotform.com%252f223182679600053%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTnDo22l7rZDqti%252fsWM0MvOMbeSwHwU0kLhsjoO8YOay%252fVz%252b1igWptvM8YwNq4kPK65fYKpea1WU1zJaMg42reQTZxBCNIhSPcAl5MIPTsbIogvE4rm2RWSITgL5OtvpudoFK197aeFM%252foQavoBkgwjY5yDWlfZAtLq7oZ9jNkdh4beF2SiiVroosa9aKUoWxVNK75GvLhXi4cwI6Id2U2vWsMglGYvPASBJbXWmAa7P&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce17ec07e0f114bd2b1ec08dcdd5a21e7%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638628626394907397%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AeDZcC1y8nCivqbssymqE%2FiiYm8nNRfy4cSqse0ru8I%3D&reserved=0>

THE GROUP IS RECOGNISED BY HCT AS THEIR STRATEGIC INDUSTRY PARTNER 

The Group was recognised by Higher Colleges of Technology (HCT) as their strategic industry partner towards the training and employment of their students and graduates. This follows our MoU signing last year towards elevating and enabling their students and graduates in the private sector. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/550415/595AE5A20EE13A497BFFC3CBB53FFBCC/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-48.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/yNDreX-Exk24YD4ZMKQsQg/545526/41B178D76F0AB97936155A9FC90A503A/nuggets-24.png> 	

WATCH OUR LATEST EPISODE OF THE PODCAST

But first, Internal! Shoutout to all our people who have been actively and positively spreading news and championing our Group in their own way, both internally and externally. We see you and hope to keep seeing you advocating, posting, sharing, and resharing!

This is one you won't want to miss! Watch now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.youtube.com%252fwatch%253fv%253dqV2iDr0OFSQ%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWTnDo22l7rZDqti%252fsWM0MvOMbeSwHwU0kLhsjoO8YOay%252fVz%252b1igWptvM8YwNq4kPK65fYKpea1WU1zJaMg42reQTZxBCNIhSPcAl5MIPTsbIogvE4rm2RWSITgL5OtvpudoFK197aeFM%252foQavoBkgwjY5yDWlfZAtLq7oZ9jNkdh4beF2SiiVroosa9aKUoWxVNK75GvLhXi4cwI6Id2U2vWsMglGYvPASBJbXWmAa7P&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce17ec07e0f114bd2b1ec08dcdd5a21e7%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638628626394923692%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=UzF3uNmA6nF%2BfZdxT01KGhNzhu5nStmBidGClrIacBc%3D&reserved=0>

Fenty Beauty ME is pulling out all the stops with an electrifying pop up!  This isn't just a pop up – it's a celebration of beauty, diversity, and all things Fenty. 

Location: D3, Building 1

Date: September 25th – 26th

Time: 2pm – 6pm
